source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_00<tab>Mogloo requires the stout arm of an adventurer.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_00<tab>モグモグホームのモグルンは、歴戦の冒険者の力に頼りたいようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_01<tab>Mogloo, Captain of the Pomguard, has asked you to aid in the defense of Zenith against the encroaching minions of the dread wyrm Nidhogg, which have become more bold since the dragon's awakening. Mogloo bids you speak with Mogkul, his second-in-command, at Asah for further details of your duty.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_01<tab>モグルンに「モグモグ護衛団」の助っ人を頼まれた。ドラヴァニア雲海のアサー天空廊で護衛団副長「モグクル」と合流し、敵が出現したら加勢しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_02<tab>On the road to Asah, you come across Mogkul being beset upon by a dragon, and quickly dispatch it, saving the tired moogle. Speak with him to ensure that he is hale and whole.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_02<tab>邪竜の眷属と交戦中のモグクルに加勢し、新たに出現した敵を討伐した。あらためて、アサー天空廊付近で「モグクル」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_03<tab>Although Mogkul managed to fell two of the beasts when they attacked, it seems a third one was just too much for him to bear. He thanks you for your assistance, and bids you return to Asah with him to speak further of Zenith's defense.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_03<tab>モグクルと合流した。いったんアサー天空廊に戻り、「モグクル」と再び合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_04<tab>Mogkul explains that the moogles in the Churning Mists have a sacred agreement with the great wyrm Hraesvelgr to keep up the maintenance of the landlords' many structures dotting the land. However, the increasing rashness of Nidhogg's brood has made it even more difficult to do their duty, and Mogkul is overjoyed when you agree to help them. Begin your valiant defense of Zenith with the other moogles at your side.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_SEQ_04<tab>モグクルは、冒険者という強力な助っ人を得て、大いにありがたがっているようだ。彼ら「モグモグ護衛団」とともに、白亜の宮殿を守っていこう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_000<tab>Ah, adventurer, word of your valorous deeds has spread far and wide. Pray lend me your ear, for there is something I would ask of you, kupo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_000強いと噂の冒険者さん。
今日は、ちょっとした相談に乗ってもらいたいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_001<tab>As you know, Nidhogg's awakening has thrown our home into chaos.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_001邪竜様が目覚めてからというもの、
なんだか、雲海は騒がしくなる一方くぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_002<tab>Our holy covenant with the great wyrm Hraesvelgr obliges us moogles to oversee upkeep of Zenith, a great spire to the west. However, Nidhogg's meddlesome minions are becoming bolder by the day.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_002モグたちは、聖竜様との盟約で、
西の方にある「白亜の宮殿」をお掃除しているくぽ。
だけど最近、邪竜様の眷属が邪魔しにくるようになったくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_003<tab>Although the stalwart members of the Pomguard are making their most valiant efforts, we are outnumbered and outmatched. I would ask that you join us in our defense of Zenith, for the sake of all the moogles of Moghome.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_003「モグモグ護衛団」もがんばっているけれど、少し不安くぽ。
だから、一緒に白亜の宮殿を守ってもらいたいくぽ。
どうか、お願いするくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_004<tab>My second-in-command, Mogkul, resides now at Asah. Speak with him to learn what aid he requires. Godsspeed adventurer!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_004詳しい話は、「アサー天空廊」にいる護衛団の副長……
「モグクル」から聞いてもらいたいくぽ。
もし戦ってる最中だったら、助太刀を頼むくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_012<tab>Speak with Mogkul in Asah to learn what aid he requires, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGLOO_000_012詳しい話は、「アサー天空廊」にいる護衛団の副長……
「モグクル」から聞いてもらいたいくぽ。
もし戦ってる最中だったら、助太刀を頼むくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_010<tab><pant> <huff> ...<var 1A 02 /var>Three<var 1A 01 /var> dragons attacked me at once, kupo! Just two would've been no problem, but <var 1A 02 /var>three<var 1A 01 /var>!? I barely escaped with my pom-pom intact. Thank you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_010はぁ、はぁ……2体倒してからの3体目は、
さすがのモグにも、きつかったくぽ……。
来てくれて、助かったくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_011<tab>Ah, so you were sent here by Captain Mogloo? Well, we'd best return to Asah and talk there─I fear this area is no longer safe.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_011……なるほど、モグルン様が君を助っ人にくぽ？
ぜひぜひ聞きたい話だけど、ここは危険地帯くぽ。
ひとまず「アサー天空廊」まで帰るくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_020<tab>Thank you for your aid before, adventurer! The minions of Nidhogg used to keep their distance, but every day more are sighted just yalms away, kupo. Defending Zenith has become quite a chore!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_020さっきは、助けてくれてありがとうくぽ！
最近、あんなふうに乱暴者の邪竜様の眷属たちが、
「白亜の宮殿」を守るモグたちを、しつこく狙ってくるくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_021<tab>Hraesvelgr holds the landmarks built by the landlords to be sacred, and has tasked mooglekind with their upkeep. But Nidhogg's brood pay our sacred covenant no mind.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_021聖竜様は、ヒトが作った建物を大切にしていて、
モグたちに、お掃除を頼んでいるくぽ。
でも、邪竜様の眷属たちは、それが気にくわないくぽ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_022<tab>We can't let them desecrate Zenith! With your help, we'll teach those brutish dragons some manners, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_022あいつらに、白亜の宮殿を壊させるわけにはいかないくぽ……！
一緒に、守ってほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_023<tab>I knew we could count on your strength! There's not much time to spare─our operations will start henceforth. The courage of the Pomguard shall not falter!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ528_01863_MOGKUL_000_023ありがとうくぽ～！
そうとなったら、さっそく作戦開始くぽ。
邪竜様の眷属たちを、こらしめてやるくぽ～！！
